Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    The Map class contains static attributes and methods representing a map object in the game. This information is displayed to the user in the shop. Map should never be instantiated, as the number of maps owned by a team is stored as a counter, not as individual map objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static int COST
      The cost, in in-game currency, of one map item.
      private static java.lang.String DESCRIPTION
      A string description of the map item.

      • getDescription

      • getCost

        public static int getCost​(int numDiscountHeroes)
        Getter method for cost. Multiplies the cost by Hero.STORE_DISCOUNT_MULTIPLIER once for each hero on the team with the store discount special ability.
        Parameters:
        numDiscountHeroes - The number of heroes on the team with the store discount special ability.
        Returns:
        The value of cost.
